title.bibl: Rovnost Ludu, (Equality of People) Chicago, Illinois, July 15th, 1907, (monthly) "Slovak Freedom" Has Outing

div.bibl: Rovnost Ludu, (Equality of People) Chicago, Illinois, July 15th, 1907, (monthly) "SLOVAK FREEDOM" HAS OUTING

body.p: Sunday, June 30th, at Atlas Park, the Slovak had the biggest attendance at a picnic in Chicago's history. The affair was sponsored by U. S. S. number 531. Being the first affair ever given by this organization, is all the more reason why it was such a huge success. Although not numbering over two hundred and fifty members at present, this society is rapidly gaining in numbers.
